name: Baby
greetingText: Welcome to the first part of your birthday present!
wishText: Soon, your birthday won't be the only anniversary to celebrate!
textInChatBox: To the love of my life, happy birthday!  Each moment with you is a reminder of how lucky I am to have found my soulmate.  You complete me in every way, and I promise to make your day as magical as you make my life.  I feel so lucky to share this life with you, and I can't wait for all the adventures we'll have.  I love you more than words can say!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are so incredibly special to me <3
